name: Bnoop's Island
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 130 in 3 days!

Theme: 10 seconds

Every 10 seconds  new obstacles and enemies spawn on the island. Bnoop has to place bombs to blow up rocks, trees and creatures in sync with the timer. The more obstacles cleared in a combo the more points they will give!

Controls

Move -> WASD

Place Bomb -> Arrow Keys

Exit to Title -> ESC
